mapper.select: SELECT no,id,subject,name,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,group_step,num FROM (SELECT no,id,subject,name,regdate,hit,group_step,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,id,subject,name,regdate,hit,group_step FROM project_replyboard ORDER BY group_id DESC , group_step ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT no,id,isreply,subject,name,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,group_step,group_id,num FROM (SELECT no,id,isreply,subject,name,regdate,hit,group_step,group_id,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,id,isreply,subject,name,regdate,hit,group_step,group_id FROM project_replyboard WHERE group_step!=1 ORDER BY group_id DESC , group_step ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT group_id,group_step FROM project_replyboard WHERE no=#{no}
